```{r include = F}
library(tidyverse)

lsa <- read_csv("lobster_size_abundance.csv")
lt <- read_csv("lobster_traps.csv")
```

```{r include = F}

# remove nas and expand rows with count larger than 1
lsa_filt <- lsa %>%
  filter(SIZE != -99999) %>%
  uncount(weights = COUNT) %>%
  mutate(MPA = case_when(
    SITE == 'IVEE' ~ 'y',
    SITE == 'NAPL' ~ 'y',
    SITE == 'AQUE' ~ 'n',
    SITE == 'CARP' ~ 'n',
    SITE == 'MOHK' ~ 'n'))

```
